message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of immense value to your business. I'm confident it's worth at least $1200000 to you. I'm willing to let it go for $1100000. This is a price that allows you significant profit while also offering me a fair return on my investment. I understand you have options, but I believe this is a deal you won't want to miss.  Let me know your thoughts.
